content.question: Which best describes the seeds used in Ai Weiweiâ€™s installation Kui Hua Zi (Sunflower Seeds)?

choices.label: Recycled plastic was molded and painted to make each seed identical.
Growers collected millions of sunflower seeds, which were donated for the installation.
Industrial processes were used to mass produce millions of small individual seeds.
Individuals created each seed by hand, resulting in millions of unique works of art.

content.answer: Individuals created each seed by hand, resulting in millions of unique works of art.

topic.text: 10.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
